title: @SSwarper
description: Dual purposes for processing a given subject's anatomical volume: skull-strip the brain and calculate the warp to a reference template/standard space.

anatUA.title: Anisotropically Smoothed Dataset
anatUA.description: Anisotropically smoothed version of the uniformized dataset

anatUAC.title: Ceiling-capped Dataset
anatUAC.description: Ceiling-capped version of the anisotropically smoothed dataset

anatQQ.title: Nonlinearly Warped Dataset
anatQQ.description: Skull-stripped dataset nonlinearly warped to the base template space

anatQQ_affine.title: Affine Transformation Matrix
anatQQ_affine.description: Affine matrix to transform original dataset to base template space

anatQQ_warp.title: Incremental Warp
anatQQ_warp.description: Incremental warp from affine transformation to nonlinearly aligned dataset

AM_snapshot.title: AM Snapshot
AM_snapshot.description: 3x3 snapshot image of the nonlinearly warped dataset with edges from the base template overlaid

MA_snapshot.title: MA Snapshot
MA_snapshot.description: Similar to AM_snapshot, but with roles of the template and anatomical dataset reversed

QC_anatQQ.title: QC anatQQ Snapshot
QC_anatQQ.description: 3 rows of 8 slices snapshot image for checking alignment

QC_anatSS.title: QC anatSS Snapshot
QC_anatSS.description: Snapshot image to check skullstripping in original space

init_overlap_qc.title: Initial Overlap QC
init_overlap_qc.description: Montage to check initial overlap of source and base datasets
